original_text: So Moses went out from God's Tent and he told the people the Lord's message. He chose 70 leaders of the Israelites and he put them round the Tent.
korean_text: 모세가 나가서 여호와의 말씀을 백성에게 알리고 백성의 장로 칠십 인을 모아 장막에 둘러 세우매

sentences.original_text: So Moses went out from God's Tent
and he told the people the Lord's message
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 백성들에게 주님의 메시지를 전했다

sentences.original_text: He chose 70 leaders of the Israelites
and he put them round the Tent
